column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The food here is hit-or-miss
column2: in my opinion. I've had some really good sandwiches (the chicken torta
column4: fried chicken) and some not so good ones (some kind of fish sandwich). The entrees are also hit-or-miss; you just have to get lucky! The menu changes pretty regularly so you always have another chance to come back
